Calon Kuat Kabareskrim Baru di Mata Novel Baswedan: Orang Baik
02 Nov 2019, 02:30 by Fikri Arigi, Endri Kurniawati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Penyidik Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) Novel Baswedan menilai sosok calon kuat Kepala Badan Reserse Kriminal (Kabareskrim) baru, Lestyo Sigit Prabowo adalah orang baik. "Saya tahu bahwa beliau orang baik. Tapi lebih lanjut saya enggak bisa komentar," kata Novel saat dihubungi Tempo, Jumat 1 November 2019.
Sigit diperkirakan akan menempati kursi Kabareskrim yang kosong setelah Idham Aziz menjabat Kapolri.
Menurut beberapa pejabat di Kepolisian, pesaing Sigit adalah Kapolda Metro Jaya Inspektur Jenderal Gatot Eddy Pramono. Sigit saat ini menjabat Kepala Divisi Profesi dan Pengamanan (Kadiv Propam) Polri.
Sebelumnya Idham Azis mengatakan akan segera menunjuk penggantinya sebagai Kepala Badan Reserse Kriminal Markas Besar Polri, untuk mempercepat pengungkapan kasus Penyidik Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi Novel Baswedan. "Dan sesaat nanti saya akan menunjuk Kabareskrim yang baru untuk segera mempercepat pengungkapan kasus Novel," kata Idham setelah rapat Paripurna pengesahan dirinya sebagai Kapolri di DPR pada Kamis, 31 Oktober 2019.
Meski menilai baik, namun Novel mengatakan Kabareskrim baru tak akan berpengaruh terhadap penyelesaian kasus kekerasan yang menimpanya. Ia menyebut siapa pun yang menjabat Kabareskrim, tugasnya tetap hanya membantu Kapolri menjalankan tanggung jawabnya.
Justru, kata dia, Idham Aziz yang sebelumnya adalah Kabareskrim, seharusnya lebih punya tanggung jawab besar untuk menuntaskan kasus penyiraman air keras yang merusak matanya itu. "Apa lagi kapolrinya mantan Kabareskrim. Menjadi Kapolri tanggung jawabnya semakin besar. Bukan tanggung jawabnya berpindah."

New Candidate for Kabareskrim in the Eyes of Baswedan Novel: Good People
02 Nov 2019, 02:30 by Fikri Arigi, Endri Kurniawati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) investigator Novel Baswedan assesses the new strong candidate for the Head of the Criminal Investigation Agency (Kabareskrim), Lestyo Sigit Prabowo is a good person. "I know that he is a good person. But further I cannot comment," Novel said when contacted by Tempo, Friday 1 November 2019.
Sigit is expected to occupy the vacant Kabareskrim seat after Idham Aziz served as National Police Chief.
According to several officials in the Police, Sigit's competitor was the Jakarta Police Chief Inspector General Gatot Eddy Pramono. Sigit is currently the Head of the Indonesian Police's Professional and Security Division (Kadiv Propam).
Earlier Idham Azis said he would immediately appoint his successor as Head of the Criminal Investigation Body of the National Police Headquarters, to accelerate the disclosure of the case of the Corruption Eradication Commission Novel Baswedan Investigator. "And soon I will appoint a new Kabareskrim to expedite the disclosure of the Novel case," Idham said after a plenary meeting of his endorsement as National Police Chief at the House of Representatives on Thursday, October 31, 2019.
Although considered good, Novel said that the new Kabareskrim would not affect the resolution of cases of violence that befell him. He said that whoever served in Kabareskrim, his job was still only to help the National Police Chief to carry out its responsibilities.
In fact, he said, Idham Aziz who was previously a Kabareskrim, should have more responsibility to solve the hard watering case that damaged his eyes. "What's more the former police chief of Kabareskrim. Becoming the Chief of Police the greater the responsibility. It's not his responsibility to move."
